channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vanguard’s Former OCIO Clients Must Stand Their Ground
item.description: Vanguard's OCIO clients should be wary of the higher-fee active funds and alternative investments that are now open to them.

item.title: 6 foods that could be making you age faster
item.description: New research shows how your diet may also play a role in how well you age.

item.title: Are Your Data Governance and Management Practices Keeping Pace with the AI Boom?
item.description: No matter how sophisticated and expensive a firm's AI tools are, it should not forget that the principle “garbage in, garbage out” (GIGO) applies to the entire investment management process.

item.title: Nvidia will win the race to a $4 trillion market cap—but the long-term big tech battle might be different, experts say
item.description: “I think, a year from now, we [will] have three $4 trillion market cap companies: Nvidia, Apple, Microsoft,” Wedbush tech analyst Dan Ives told Fortune.

item.title: Book Review: Default
item.description: Argentina’s debt restructuring tests the theoretical limits of chaos theory. Gregory Makoff's feat is to build his narrative as a thriller without losing the detailed facts valued by specialists.

item.title: Florida farmers turn to an ancient tree from India as the state’s once-famous citrus industry dries up
item.description: “For the most part, the citrus industry has died in Florida.”

item.title: Conundrum Cubed: Scope 3 for Financials
item.description: Proxy data and estimates are likely to play an important role in plugging disclosure gaps in financial institutions' Scope 3 emissions.

item.title: British fashion house Burberry is reportedly laying off hundreds of employees amid huge stock selloff
item.description: Employees were informed during a Zoom meeting in late June, with those affected told they were facing redundancy or having to reapply for their roles.

item.title: Hedge Funds: A Poor Choice for Most Long-Term Investors?
item.description: By allocating to a diversified pool of hedge funds, many institutional investors are unwittingly reducing their equity holdings.

item.title: Alec Baldwin is about to go on trial in the death of ‘Rust’ cinematographer. Here are key things to know
item.description: Baldwin is charged with felony involuntary manslaughter. If a jury unanimously convicts him, he could get 18 months in prison.
